name: SMOKY CITY TOUR! Flying Around Edmonton in a Cessna 172
description:
Having just completed my Private Pilot's License, I thought it was about time I took a passenger with me (and recorded it)!

In mid-September, smoke from all of the forest fires along the coast quickly brought the visibility down all across the province, but this particular day in Edmonton only brought it down to 8 miles.

That's still well within limits for VFR, and it ended up being quite a smooth day over Alberta's capital city! 

DISCLAIMER: This is a non-instructional video and should not be used for flight training purposes. All video footage was recorded with a mounted GoPro or filmed handheld by my passenger.
